articles.description: Keanu Reeves reunited with his band Dogstar at BottleRock Napa Valley music festival on Saturday for their first performance in over 20 years.
articles.content:
Keanu Reeves is back onstage!
The actor, 58, reunited with his band Dogstar on Saturday for their first performance in over 20 years. The trio, including Bret Domrose and Rob Mailhouse were on the l… [+1949 chars]
